result.execSummary:
The defendant Lisa R Richter was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Cash bail applied to fine and costs, remainder to be paid at $$25.00 per month, commencing 051616, alternate 8 days jail if not paid.
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lisa R Richter

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Lisa R Richter in court, in custody, with Attorney Nicole Williams Buttery.   David John Behm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a no contest plea to Count #1.  Court performs plea colloquy and finds Defendant guilty of Count #1. State gives sentencing recommendation.  Attorney Williams Buttery makes statements regarding sentencing.  Kenneth C. makes statements.  Defendant makes statements.  Court sentences the Defendant to the following:

COUNT #1:  FINE:  $365.60 & $200.00 DNA surcharge -(to be paid out of cash bail posted ($150.00) and remainder due at $25.00 per month, commencing 5/16/16, alternate 8 days jail if not paid.)

Attorney Nicole Williams Buttery in court.   Defendant Lisa R Richter did not appear.   Michele W. Hulgaard appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Buttery Williams requests an adjourned date for plea and sentence.  Court adjourns.   Bail remains as fixed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 15, 2016 at 03:30 pm.

Attorney Nicole Williams Buttery in court.   Defendant Lisa R Richter did not appear.   Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Williams Buttery requests a date within 45 days for review of Defendant's treatment. State has no objection.   Bail remains as fixed.  Hearing scheduled for March 4, 2016 at 09:30 am.

Attorney Nicole Williams Buttery in court.   Defendant Lisa R Richter did not appear.   Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Williams Buttery requests an adjournment so she can review new offer with her client.  Court adjourns.   Bail remains as fixed.  Hearing scheduled for January 15, 2016 at 10:00 am.
to appear filed by Attorney Nicole Williams Buttery

Defendant Lisa R Richter in court with Attorney Nicole Williams Buttery.  Bryan C. Bayer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Attorney Williams Buttery requests an adjournment.    Bail remains as fixed.  Hearing scheduled for December 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant is not to have any violent contact with Kenneth C.
Defendant Lisa R Richter in court.  Kristi J Gordon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court advises of right to an attorney.  Hearing scheduled for November 6, 2015 at 09:30 am.
